title: Comment on Watch The Hitch: An Indie-Documentary on The Life & Times of Christopher Hitchens by ChrisD
text:
A quick note: Kristoffer Seland Hellesmark was looking for a documentary on Christopher Hitchens to watch, but could never find one. So, after waiting a while, he said to himself, “Why don’t I just make one?” The result is the 80-minute documentary about Hitchens, lovingly entitled The Hitch , which features clips from his speeches and interviews. We’ve added it to our collection of 200+ Free Documentaries , a subset of our larger collection, 1,150 Free Movies Online: Great Classics, Indies, Noir, Westerns, etc. .
